author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify muon numbering, adding scenarios for the corretced Run3 geometry. Backport the 3 PR's #36554, #36679. Need a fresh PR for GT to make it work

#### PR validation:

To be tested with the PR's #36740, #36780 and #36781

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backporting the PR's already in the master to make the correct Run3 geometry scenario
title: Run3-gex108XD Modify muon numbering, adding scenarios for the corretced Run3 geometry
